sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CalendarService } from 'src/app/service/calendar.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-person-view', templateUrl: './person-view.component.html', styleUrls: ['./person-view.component.css'] }) export class PersonViewComponent implements OnInit{ constructor(private calendarService:CalendarService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.calendarService.setStatus('yes'); } }

Beyond Medicine, There's Care

Tip 1: Stay Hydrated

Drinking water has numerous health benefits. It aids in digestion, keeps the skin glowing, and is essential for overall well-being.

Tip 2: Regular Exercise

Engage in physical activities regularly. It helps in maintaining a healthy heart, muscles, and bones. Be Healthy and keep exercise

Tip 3: Balanced Diet

Include fruits, vegetables, lean meats, and whole grains in your diet. Avoid excessive sugar and salt. Eat healthy with more vegetable
